markdownRemark.html:
Hello and welcome to my new website! I’ve been meaning to refresh my site for quite some time so I’m .

Stuff I Used to Make This Site

  • Gatsby is a really cool static site generator built with React.
  • gatsby-starter-blog was written by Kyle Matthews and contains boilerplate for blogging, analytics, and much more for Gatsby.
  • Ant Design is an awesome React component library and design framework.
  • coolors is a great tool for quickly generating color schemes.
  • Netlify is a fantastic service for hosting and deploying websites.

frontmatter.title: Welcome!
frontmatter.description: Welcome to my new website! Click here to see my first post!
